text: Louis Fierens was a archer from Belgium. Fierens competed at the 1920 Summer Olympics and won three medals.Louis FIERENS He was born on 14 October 1875 and died in 1967.Louis Fierens == References == Category:1875 births Category:1967 deaths Category:Belgian archers Category:Olympic gold medalists for Belgium Category:Olympic silver medalists for Belgium
title: Louis Fierens
